# üõ†Ô∏è Skills
## üêü Data collection
+ **Fish behaviour in the wild**: Designed and implemented experiments to observe fish behaviour in the field using scuba diving, snorkelling and live or remote video recordings. Analysed videos manually or using Boris software.
+ **Marine fieldwork organisation**: Planned and led two field trips involving scuba diving and snorkelling in Australia. Responsibilities included securing funding, obtaining permits and ethics approval, risk assessments, team training, and field logistics.
+ **Fish behaviour in the lab**: Designed and set up laboratory experiments to video-record fish behaviour (such as tool use, personality, mate choice). Analysed videos manually or with automatic position tracking on R.
+ **Community science**: Developed a campaign to collect data and raise awareness about fish tool use, which included creating a questionnaire, coding a website in CSS and HTML, developing an email sending strategy and creating social media posts.
+ *Snail behaviour and morphology in the lab*: Reared *Physa acuta* snails with or without odours of predators in the lab and assessed their anti-predator defences (morphology and behaviour). Analysed their morphology using ImageJ or the Momocs R package.
+ *Microsatellite sequencing*: Performed DNA extraction, PCR and peak assignment on Geneious.
+ *RAD sequencing*: Performed DNA extraction and library preparation for Illumina sequencing.
